name: LymphomaDiagnosisPriorToUrologyCare
title: Lymphoma Diagnosis Prior to Urology Care
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This grouping of diagnoses identifies patients who may be immunocompromised prior to urology care.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who may be immunocompromised prior to initiation of BCG for bladder cancer care.),(Inclusion Criteria: Only use codes which represent lymphoma.),(Exclusion Criteria: Exclude codes that do not represent lymphoma.)

concept.display: Malignant lymphoma, no International Classification of Diseases for Oncology subtype (morphologic abnormality)
